address: 75 Thompson St, New York, NY 10012, United States
name: Piccola Cucina Osteria Siciliana

reviews.review: Local at its best! Food was fantastic, as was the service
Love all the food! And great fast service! And finished with my favorite dessert pana cotta.
(Theyre on Thompson street and not Spring!) Bright menus with buzzy/busy ambience. Came before the lunch crowd and food was served relatively quickly. Loved the fish and uni pasta.
Too much cheese
Nice pasta at affordable price
BEST Italian restaurant in the neighborhood, great service and atmosphere. My go to!

This was EASILY one of the best restaurants my wife and I ate at last week on our NYC trip. The menu is superb, with great variety and many nice options. This feels like a genuinely home-style restaurant in Naples or Rome - authentically
How to be reborn!It was amazing to find this wonderful place on our vacation.
Great food. Great service. Very friendly. Try the cannolis and the homemade pasta and burrata!

i am an exchange student from Italy, and i missed the italian food so much, i dont miss it anymore because yesterday i had the most amazing experience in this ITALIAN restaurant. Employees are so nice, and after a while i had change to
39$ per person. Food is a bit saltier than I expected. Great service. Had a wonderful Saturday afternoon here.
Within a location. For the superb meal, the fee is well worth it. Both dishes were delicious. Excellent chef and experienced wait staff. It was an excellent experience. It was well worth the money.

We had the best food I ever ate at this restaurant! The team was very attentive and want you to have the best time ever. We also attended the opera, and it was so wonderful and made me cry about the beauty and lovely voices I ever heard. I will definitely be back and highly recommend the place if you love exquisite food!
Fresh, delicious.
Fantastic Italian in New York Soho. Highly recommended

Central location in great area off Spring St. We opted for indoor dining but the outdoor seating looked lovely and cute; looks like an equally good option, based on some reviews here. Indoor dining is well spaced with plastic separators
Few square meters of real Italy
very good food and staff
The food is delicious. I love Italian food and this was beyond my expectations.The outdoor space is very nice. Look forward to coming back for many more meals. highly recommend
Beautiful, calm , essential atmosphere for fine dining experience.
It had an excellent wait staff, very pretty, and the food I had was very good.

This is the third time I go back with American friends and every time I am amazed at how great this place is. 100% Italian, very high quality food, courteous and efficient staff, characteristic location and the scent
Top quality
Delicious!

This was recommended by a italian colleague who is from Sicily, needless to say more. We tried several appetizers and pastas and found the food delicious, both comfort and elegant. The seafood is particularly good (sea urchin pasta, grill
Amazing service in brick weather too. Mitch was excellent

All food is well prepared and is really tasty. I particularly enjoyed the cavateli al rag. The service is very fast and efficient. My only suggestion would be to have more separation between the tables in the outdoor space.

The food is delicious. I love Italian food and this was beyond my expectations. The calamari and octopus both very fresh and generous and the pasta to die for. Generous food and lovely setting. The outdoor space is very nice. Look forward to coming back for many more meals. highly recommend
This simply left us with a - wow.Tiny restaurant with approx 28 seats. Very familiar and cosy. Nothing fancy-
Intimate, classic, delicious. Love that the pasta dishes are served in pans.
This is gonna be my new favorite spot! They have a full bar, a live band, and GREAT food. Their house special pan roast is a must try.
Unaccomodating host, really poor seating of tables for 2s
Great restaurant and excellent service
The Piccola people is the best in italian gastronomy!! Love them so much
Nice restaurant, reasonable price!
Ravioli OssobucoFettuccine Ragu TruffleArugula Salad
Ive been passing this place all summer and (when outdoor dining opened) the place was always packed.So I decided to go there on a date (first date, bad idea).
Great authentic Italian food. Super cute spot in a great location.
This place has great pasta dishes.  Always cook to perfection.  Comprehensive wine list.  Excellent service.  Never feel rushed even when we linger after a meal to talk.
Good selection of wines and mouthwatering food.
wonderful italian food!
Italian food, yeah, delicious. Very appetizing. I will be back with my friends. It has a nice interior. They have so many great reviews for a reason.
Italian food at this place - very good. looking forward to a return visit. atmosphere is similar to a cafe in san jose i loved.
Top restaurant, small, musical and festive even when you are not the party type. The food was very good. I'm glad I discovered such a place in New York!
italian food and the setting at this place is super good. It's so appetizing. Looking forward to returning with my coworkers. It has a cool interior. They have so many great reviews for a reason.
Nice location for quality Italian food. I look forward to a return trip. The place has a cool atmosphere. Menu is like a cafe in Indianapolis I loved.
Top
Taste super yummy
Great environment and super friendly service. The menu was crisp and enchanting. Will definitely recommend this restaurant to others. Affordable prices and generous meals. Great work.

A small corner of Italy in New York City! On our last evening in the Big Apple we had dinner in this nice little restaurant that was recommended to us, located in the elegant neighborhood of Soho. We had to wait a bit for the table, but it
Seriously good food!  The wait staff is always more than courteous and we feel like queens when we come here!  Piccola has become a regular destination for me and my girlfriends.
The food here is it, so delicious and I love the service, very clean place as well I give it 5 stars.
Friendly staff and delicious drinks

A very fantastic experience from this restaurant. All of the staff cares so much about ensuring your stay was memorable. I was amazed I went here because all of their foods are affordable and tasteful. The food combinations are out of this world and to die for. Kudos to the chef! Highly recommend this restaurant.
really nice staff and great food

The food was Half raw but it was delicious it was not very expencib but it was a good expriensa go to this restaurant
Good place to eat italian foods pasta pizza delicious

Definitely recommend a reservation at this small restaurant, where indoor seating for 30 is jammed into the space. The calamari was grilled and served over guacamole which made the dish unlike any calamari Ive tried before. The
The food was Half raw but it was delicious it was not very expencib but it was a good expriensa go to this restaurant
One of the best spritz in NYC. And the food is delicious.A must go place.
Good
They make very good and abundant first courses. Very nice and nice staff. I will definitely stay here again on my next trip to NY
The best Italian in New Tork to try absolutely
The atmosphere is great here. It is good for dating however the space is a little bit limited. The food are pretty Italian, highly recommend the green Tagliatelle.
the best pasta dishes. great atmosphere, lively with music, but great for couples. amazing service. one of the best places to eat in New York. small and cosy.

I had the seafood pasta, a dish i frequently order when holidaying in Italy- this rivals the best I've EVER had, i can still taste it now thinking about it. Cosy tables close together. Amazing tasting food, highly recommended.
Excellent !!!!!!, my recommendation is the ravioli, try the wine !!!!
Good Italian food.  Small place very crowded

Great food & great service! Recommend the spaghetti pomodora & mushroom pizza. Daniella & rest of the ladies were so kind & accommodating.  This is truly a gem, one of a kind place lace with modern yet minimalistic decor.

This place will always hold very special memories as we spent our wedding celebration here last month. Everything was absolutely perfect. The food was outstanding - we had a set menu which we were able to tailor to include my favourite dish
Food is great. Dining room is very small and tightly packed. It was extremely noisy at the time of my visit.
Great lunch deal.  Glad that we booked a reservation.  Worth coming again if you have the time.
Small Italian place with yummy pasta. I especially liked the spaghetti ai ricci di mare (spaghetti with sea urchin).  The Crme brle was also  delicious. Would definitely cone back again.
Best Italian food in the city hands down. The atmosphere and service were fantastic! You will not be disappointed with any dish on the menu. Also makes for a wonderful date spot.
Excellent restaurant and for lunch all dishes are 11 dollars! To do absolutely and enjoy a good ristretto

Outstanding Italian food and wine in a restaurant full of character.. The Restaurants name tells the story, there are limited number of seats available, so bookings and a short wait is required, even in the off season.. BUT we'll worth the effort for the amazing experience..
The best authentic Italian restaurant in NYC. Let yourself be recommended, good price, super friendly service. Excellent food

Delicious pasta and wonderful service in this charming little restaurant. They recommended a fantastic Sicilian wine that went great with our food. We would definitely recommend others to reserve here!
Great place and considering how popular they have maintained a very friendly attitude (rare in NYC restaurant scene).
Soo good..Small and crowded, but food is very delicious and reasonably priced, especially for lunch

I was at first a little stressed when I walked into this restaurant for my 7:00 pm reservation- it's tiny! But all that quickly faded away. The staff is so hospitable and welcome, you feel like you are family. The wine and pasta dishes were
We found this place by accident and it was luck that guid us there.Piccola cucina in Italian means a small kitchen (I think), and this place is small.
Very good pasta. The place is a bit too cramped to call it cozy though.
A small neighborhood Italian cafe with beautiful tagliatelle with wild boar ragu. Very popular spot and delicious food!
Really small, but wonderful place! The staff is helpful and friendly, and the food as good as it gets.
Not great not bad.
Fabulous!!!
Excellent food amazing staff. Food cooked and served 5 star calibre!
Absolutely amazing food
Well cook food, but not enough spaces.

Love this place! It is our 3rd time here. Our server Ilaria was fantastic! She really made this experience extra special. We had the pasta alla Norma & boar ragu. Delicious!! And the pasta comes in pots. Love it. Its really really small

We had read previous reviews so we figured we were in for a decent meal but it turned out to be absolutely excellent in every way, food wise. My friend had the octopus salad which was a whole grilled tentacle and absolutely scrumptuous. I
Excellent!!!We come again !!!
For the price this is probably the best pasta and risotto you can get. Really small place but has a great atmosphere would definitely recommend anyone to come.

A wonderful experience. Literally loved the people, the atmosphere, the food, and the entertainment!!! Cant wait to visit NYC again just so I can eat here again!  Travelling with 11 people is hard and some restaurants dont like it... but this place - the more the merrier
Love the lunch special, wine options are wonderful. I always order the lobster linguine
Yum yum
Very good and authentic Sicilian food! We felt a bit squeezed though

In love with this site. In 5 days we went to 2 of their restaurants. To this we went on a Monday to the noon menu ($ 11 the plate). Although most opt for Lobster Linguine, I recommend 100% Fusilloni di Gragnano with

Fast service. Reasonably priced lunch specials. Fresh pasta.
Excellent food
The most incredible mean I've ever eaten!!!
cute little place with a big portion. the seats are a bit cramped but it was fine!
Excellent Sicilian food, try spaghetti with sea urchins or cuttlefish ink spaghetti
Providence does fine dining done right.
Absolutely delicious, wonderful service and a lovely setting
Maybe i had too much expectation, but the food was rather disappointing here. Too salty and noodles were undercooked. I will give it another shot next time.
One of the best Italian meals I have ever had. The octopus appetizer rivals any I have eaten in all of my travels. To make it even better,  the staff were awesome and the vibe was fun.
Bona food thanks.
Amazing food great service friendly staff
Wonderful experience
Came here with a decent chunk of my family. Service was amazing, and the food as well. Try the ravioli with sausage sauce. It was so good!

Highly recommend their appetizers, they have a delicious and interesting take on eggplant parmesan. The main courses are mediocre though, especially the risotto which was hard and undercooked when I went.

I ate pasta which was very tasty and was deliciously prepared.Very good chef, the food is very tasty. The place is very cozy and I like it.The staff is very helpful, and kind. I'm going to have one of my favorite places.

I had huge expectations for this place, viewing their ranking on trip advisor and what others had said about it. The restaurant was very small (which I gathered from other reviews) but the way the tables were situated I had zero elbow room

Very cozy restaurant with a very tasty menu and incredible service. I am Italian hence i'm always sceptical of italian places abroad but in this one I felt like I was being thrown back into a small restaurant in Sicily, with great food, wine and service. Keep it up! You're doing an amazing job. This is how to stand out in NY!
Simply extraordinary. Small place, you may have to line up on the sidewalk, but it's worth it. Pasta for lunch at 11 dollars! Cordial attention. Impossible better
Foods are very good, over my expectations;service is excellent, why 3stars... because restaurant is really small. Anyway , for me it isn't matter, I will come again.

Fun and energetic staff, delicious food, great atmosphere
Its perfect! Really good and friendly attention. The place its small so I recommend to make a reservation before. Good wine, the best pasta and dessert options.

Fantastic little spot. And when I say little I mean, don't bring extra stuff with you there's no place to put it. Food was outstanding. Served hot and fast, but they don't put the rush on you to get you out. Reservations only the night we
Tasty.
Delicious Food, great service

Very nice decor, albeit a bit cozy. Food may have been too classic for me, but their grilled fish was pretty good. A good place to eat if you enjoy classic Italian food that leans mostly towards seafood.
